changelog:
Initial release of KernelSU Anti-Bootloop & Backup Module

Features:
- Anti-bootloop protection with automatic recovery
- Comprehensive backup and restoration system
- OverlayFS integration for safe system modifications
- WebUIX interface for easy management
- Boot monitoring and safety features
- Encryption support for backups
- Profile-based backup configuration
releaseNotes: Welcome to the first release of the KernelSU Anti-Bootloop & Backup Module. This module combines robust anti-bootloop protection with comprehensive backup capabilities to keep your device safe from soft bricks and data loss.
